contents.text: Thank you for calling Nelson Staffing, your San Francisco partner for engineering temporary staffing and direct hire solutions.
For candidate services and career opportunities, press 1.
For temporary engineering staffing positions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a specialist in temporary staffing.

navigationGoals: I need to apply for a short-term engineering assignment in San Francisco starting next week.
I want to find a temporary engineering assignment in San Francisco that matches my military avionics maintenance experience.
I want to explore SF-based temporary engineering contractor roles and get details on available assignments.
I need help finding and applying for a temporary engineering job.
I’d like information on short-term engineering assignments in San Francisco that match my physics background.

contents.text: For direct hire job opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our direct hire recruitment team.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for permanent direct-hire engineering positions in San Francisco.
I’m interested in applying for a full-time engineering role as a veteran with project management skills.
I’m interested in applying for a direct-hire embedded software engineer position—what’s the recruitment workflow?
I’d like assistance applying for a permanent engineering position.
I want to explore permanent engineering roles in San Francisco suitable for a physics graduate.

contents.text: For client services and employer staffing solutions, press 2.
For new staffing solution requests, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a client solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to set up a new engineering staffing solution for an upcoming project.
As a veteran-owned small business, I need to set up a new engineering staffing solution.
I need to discuss provisioning a new pool of QA automation engineers for our project engagement.
I want to request temporary engineering staff for my small business.
I need to request new technical support staff for my university physics research project.

contents.text: For existing account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account support team.

navigationGoals: I need to review and resolve billing charges on our existing staffing account.
I have a question about the billing on our existing staffing account with Nelson.
I have a billing discrepancy on my existing staffing account and need to review the invoice breakdown.
I have questions about my account and need help with my latest invoice.
I’d like to check the status of an invoice for the lab assistants we hired.
